sections.heading: public agency; status.A joint public agency created by public agencies pursuant to the Joint Public Agency Act shall not be considered a state agency, and an employee of such an entity or agency shall not be considered a state employee

sections.text:
13-2549.Joint public agency; status.

A joint public agency created by public agencies pursuant to the Joint Public Agency Act shall not be considered a state agency, and an employee of such an entity or agency shall not be considered a state employee.

SourceLaws 1999, LB 87, ยง 49.
